resources.string: Single or multiple username can be added.\nAdd commas for multiple username.\nExample: tom,peter,robert
Only one groupname should be entered.

This is a demo application which is using the PTT Pro call and message intent for initiating PTT Pro call or messaging.

The intent information is shared below:


■ PTT Pro Call To Group/User 
     ▪ Action Name: com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_CALL 
     ▪ Extra 0 Type: Integer 
     ▪ Extra 0 Name: recipientType 
     ▪ Extra 0 Value: 1/0 
     ▪ Extra 1 Type: String 
     ▪ Extra 1 Name: recipientName 
     ▪ Extra 1 Value: username or groupname 


ADB Example: 
     • adb shell am broadcast -a com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_CALL --ei recipientType 1 --es recipientName 'meru_admin' 
     • adb shell am broadcast -a com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_CALL --ei recipientType 0 --es recipientName 'tom' 


■ PTT Pro Message To Group/User 
     ▪ Action Name: com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_MESSAGE 
     ▪ Extra 0 Type: Integer 
     ▪ Extra 0 Name: recipientType 
     ▪ Extra 0 Value: 1/0 
     ▪ Extra 1 Type: String 
     ▪ Extra 1 Name: recipientName 
     ▪ Extra 1 Value: username or groupname 
     ▪ Extra 2 Type: String 
     ▪ Extra 2 Name: message 
     ▪ Extra 2 Value: Any message in string format 


ADB Example: 
     • adb shell am broadcast -a com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_MESSAGE --ei recipientType 1 --es recipientName 'meru_admin' --es message 'Hi! This is a test message.' 
     • adb shell am broadcast -a com.symbol.wfc.pttpro.ACTION_PTT_PRO_MESSAGE --ei recipientType 0 --es recipientName 'tom' --es message 'Hi! This is a test message.'
